name: Clear Veil
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 100% for all allies for 3 turns
Increase Stop resistance by 100% for 3 turns to all allies

name: Clear Veil
潔淨護罩
깨끗한 베일
Voile transparent
Schleierheben
Velo transparente
desc_short: Boost poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, stone and stop resistance for all allies
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化停止的耐性
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력, 스톱 저항력 상승
Augmente la rés. à poi., som., sil., para., conf., mala., pétri. et stop pour tous les alliés
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. al ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf, pie y paro de todos los aliados
desc_long: Boosts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, stone, and stop resistance for all allies.
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化停止的耐性。
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력과 스톱 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la résistance à poison, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie, pétrification et stop pour tous les alliés.
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la resistencia al veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad, piedra y paro de todos los aliados.
